content: My application reads data from multiple hospital systems (EMR, lab system, radiology) and stores all this data on a FHIR server. For various reasons, it will need to store the origin of each piece of data, along with the time of update (for traceability). The traceability information is needed both for auditing reasons as well as for logic for resolving data conflicts. Is there a standard way to do it? E.g. should the tracability information be added as extensions for each resource, or is there a better place to store it?
